extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     Level 2 or perm of the Dept. of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from LLCU233; ITLN233; ITLN331.
Equivalency    ITLN233.

basic.description: A survey of Italian literature, through selected texts of representative authors, from the Middle Ages to the eighteenth century.
basic.subject: LLCU
basic.title: Survey of Italian Literature I
